name: southernlights
description:
A 256 colors scheme with identical colors in both Vim and GVim.

screenshots: http://sites.google.com/site/jalvesaq/vimrplugin
install_details:
copy southernlights.vim to ~/vim/colors

If you are using Linux, put the following in your .vimrc:

if $DISPLAY != "" || &term =~ "xterm"
  let &t_Co = 256
  colorscheme southernlights
endif

If you are using Windows, put in your vimrc:

colorscheme southernlights
